ygData.subject: Re: Spell damage
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, it will (on average) do more damage with Tashan/Tashani.  Also, it is only the spells under level 16 that do partial resists.  All the upper level spells
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, it will (on average) do more damage with Tashan/Tashani. Also, it is
only the spells under level 16 that do partial resists. All the upper level
spells are still all or nothing.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
